metadata.title: PANOT - Your external memory for personal relationships
metadata.description: Record your interactions by voice, keep your contacts' information automatically updated, and never forget the important details of your relationships.

hero.subtitle: your everyday companion to make your contacts less like a static entity and more like a living being.
